org.deeplearning4j.nn.conf.layers.setup

Class ConvolutionLayerSetup

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.nn.conf.layers.setup.ConvolutionLayerSetup

  • public class ConvolutionLayerSetup
extends java.lang.Object
    Automatic configuration of convolutional layers: Handles all layer wise interactions between convolution/subsampling -> dense/output convolution -> subsampling among others. It does this by tracking a moving window of all the various configurations through out the network. The moving window tracks everything from the out channels of the previous layer as well as the different interactions such as when a shift from convolution to dense happens.
